## Description {#details}

A set of live virtual registers and physical register units.

This is a wrapper around a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sparseset">SparseSet</a> which deals with mapping register unit and virtual register indexes to an index usable by the sparse set.

Definition at line 261 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/registerpressure-h">RegisterPressure.h</a>.
